verses.verse: Even to-day<WH3117> is my complaint<WH7879> rebellious<WH4805>: My stroke<WH3027> is heavier<WH3513> than my groaning<WH585>.
Oh that<WH5414> I knew<WH3045> where I might find<WH4672> him<WH935>! That I might come even to his seat<WH8499>!
I would set my cause<WH4941> in order<WH6186> before<WH6440> him<WH4390>, And fill my mouth<WH6310> with arguments<WH8433>.
I would know<WH3045> the words<WH4405> which he would answer<WH6030> me<WH995>, And understand what he would say unto me<WH559>.
Would he contend<WH7378> with<WH5978> me in the greatness<WH7230> of his power<WH3581>? Nay<WH7760>; but he would give heed unto me.
There the upright<WH3477> might reason<WH3198> with him<WH6403>; So should I be delivered for ever<WH5331> from my judge<WH8199>.
Behold <WH1980>, I go forward<WH6924>, but he is not there<WH268>; And backward, but I cannot perceive him<WH995>;
On the left hand<WH8040>, when he doth work<WH6213>, but I cannot behold<WH2372> him<WH5848>; He hideth himself on the right hand<WH3225>, that I cannot see him<WH7200>.
But he knoweth<WH3045> the way<WH1870> that I take<WH5978>; When he hath tried<WH974> me<WH3318>, I shall come forth as gold<WH2091>.
My foot<WH7272> hath held<WH270> fast to his steps<WH838>; His way<WH1870> have I kept<WH8104>, and turned not aside<WH5186>.
I have not gone back<WH4185> from the commandment<WH4687> of his lips<WH8193>; I have treasured<WH6845> up the words<WH561> of his mouth<WH6310> more than my necessary food<WH2706>.
But he is in one<WH259> mind<WH7725>, and who can turn him<WH5315>? And what his soul desireth<WH183>, even that he doeth<WH6213>.
For he performeth<WH7999> that which is appointed<WH2706> for me<WH7227>: And many such things are with him<WH2007>.
Therefore am I terrified<WH926> at his presence<WH6440>; When I consider<WH995>, I am afraid of him<WH6342>.
For God<WH410> hath made my heart<WH3820> faint<WH7401>, And the Almighty<WH7706> hath terrified me<WH926>;
Because I was not cut off<WH6789> before<WH6440> the darkness<WH2822>, Neither did he cover<WH3680> the thick darkness<WH652> from my face<WH6440>.
